# zzoo.dev

## Identity
- Name: zzoo
- Role: Full-stack Developer & Solopreneur
- Website: https://zzoo.dev

## Expertise
- Full-stack web development (React, Next.js, TypeScript)
- AI-assisted development workflows
- Scalable web applications and technical architecture
- Cloudflare Workers deployment
- Solo product development from idea to launch

## Products

### Mealio — Photo-First Meal Tracking App
- Category: Mobile App (iOS/Android)
- Value: Log meals in 15 seconds with just a photo — no calorie databases, no manual input
- Target: People who tried meal tracking but quit because it was too tedious
- Differentiator: Photo-first approach eliminates friction. Guest mode for instant trial. 15-second capture flow.
- Tech: React Native, Expo, Rust/Axum API, PostgreSQL, GCP Cloud Run
- URL: https://zzoo.dev/en/projects/mealio

### Permanent Site Blocker — Chrome Extension
- Category: Chrome Extension
- Value: Block distracting websites permanently with no unblock button
- Target: Knowledge workers, students, developers struggling with focus
- Differentiator: Irreversibility is the feature. Dual-layer blocking. ~300 lines vanilla JS, zero dependencies.
- Tech: Chrome Extension, Manifest V3, declarativeNetRequest API
- URL: https://zzoo.dev/en/projects/site-blocker

### zzoo.dev — Personal Branding Site
- Category: Website (Open Source)
- Value: Developer portfolio optimized for SEO, AEO, and GEO — discoverable by both humans and AI
- Target: Developers interested in SEO/AEO/GEO, solopreneurs starting personal branding
- Differentiator: Three-pillar search visibility (SEO + AEO + GEO). SSG + edge serving. Open source.
- Tech: Next.js 16, React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS v4, Cloudflare Workers
- URL: https://zzoo.dev/en/projects/zzoo-dev
